alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 26 at 2:34AM MST until January 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, with the highest amounts in the western Bighorns north of Powder River Pass. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains West and Bighorn Mountains Southeast. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. This will be a long duration event with impacts to travel for several days.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West
